GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles, optionally sorted by any valid column and ordered in ascending or descending order.

queries.name: sort_by
queries.description: Column to sort the articles by. Valid columns include 'article_id', 'author', 'title', 'comment_count', 'topic', 'created_at', 'article_img_url', and 'votes'. Defaults to 'created_at'.

queries.name: order
queries.description: The order in which to sort the articles: 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Defaults to 'desc'.

errors.400: Bad request - invalid column specified for sort_by or invalid order (must be 'asc' or 'desc').

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by its ID

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves the comments by an article ID

exampleRequest.body: Pure tuna is the way to go!

comment.author: butter_bridge
comment.body: Pure tuna is the way to go!

errors.400: Bad request - missing required fields, invalid data types, or user does not exist
errors.404: Not found - the specified article_id does not exist

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the vote count of an article by a given amount

errors.400: Bad request - missing required field `inc_votes`, invalid data type, or inc_votes is not a number
errors.404: Not found - the specified article_id does not exist

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment by its ID

errors.404: Not found - the specified comment_id does not exist

GET /api/users.description: Responds with an array of user objects containing username, name, and avatar_url properties
